headline: Options Traders Report ‘Unusual Inflows’ Into Dollar Tree Stock (DLTR)
summary: After years of miscues and misfortune, circumstances are finally brightening for discount retailer Dollar Tree (DLTR). The business is now effectively unshackled, thanks to the company’s decision to divest struggling Family Dollar for just over $1 billion. Adding to the enthusiasm for DLTR stock, CFO Stewart Glendinning recently purchased a significant number of shares. Dollar Tree store in Johnson City, Tennessee Glendinning acquired 17,000 shares valued at almost $1.24 million. It’s not every
